title: OAuth2 no longer available
content: Since Thunderbird v. 140.1 installed, have been unable to send emails. Get pop-up instruction to check password. Using AOL, which requires OAuth2. But OAuth2 no longer appears in the Authentication Method drop-down menu.

title: Sometimes when I run a search on mail (Ctrl+Shift+F) the results window judders up and down making it difficult to read.  Any ideas as to wh?
content: Sometimes when I run a search in Tbird (Ctrl+Shift+F) the results window judders up and down. Any ideas why, or what is causing this? Running under Win 10; both win and TB updated for all patches. Thanks.
